title: The Last Alliance
subtitle: Rise of the Human Empire
description: Lead humanity through its darkest hour as ancient evils awaken and threaten civilization. Unite the scattered kingdoms, forge powerful alliances, and build an empire capable of defending against the supernatural forces that seek to destroy everything humanity has built.
shortDescription: Unite humanity and forge an empire to survive the supernatural onslaught.

story.synopsis: In an age of chaos, humanity's scattered kingdoms must unite against rising supernatural threats. As Commander of the Alliance forces, lead your people from desperation to dominance.
story.prologue: For centuries, humanity prospered in blissful ignorance of the darkness lurking at the edges of the world. But the seals are breaking. Ancient horrors stir. The vampires have awoken from their millennium slumber. The Naga have emerged from the depths. Cryptids roam the wilderness. And the dead... the dead no longer rest. Only through unity can humanity survive.
story.epilogue: Through blood, sacrifice, and unwavering courage, humanity has proven itself worthy of survival. The Alliance stands as a beacon of hope in a world of darkness. But this is not the end - it is merely the beginning of a new age.
story.setting: The Central Kingdoms - a collection of human realms threatened by supernatural forces
